scripts.build: sass assets/css/dev/style.scss assets/css/style.css --style compressed && sass assets/css/dev/public-style.scss assets/css/public-style.css --style compressed && terser assets/js/dev/general.js assets/js/dev/abteilung.js assets/js/dev/ansprechpartner.js assets/js/dev/ausbildungsberuf.js assets/js/dev/azubi.js assets/js/dev/plan.js assets/js/dev/standardplaene.js --output assets/js/script.js --compress --mangle
